analyzed: ▁ pi ṇḍ u kkhep aka sikkhāpada

original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū piṇḍukkhepakaṁ bhuñjanti …pe…
analyzed: ▁tena ▁kho ▁pana ▁samayena ▁chabbaggiyā ▁bhikkhū ▁ pi ṇḍ u kkhep akaṃ ▁bhuñjant i ▁pe
▁na ▁ pi ṇḍ u kkhep akaṃ ▁ bhuñj issāmīti ▁sikkhā ▁ karaṇīy āti
▁na ▁ pi ṇḍ u kkhep akaṃ ▁bhuñji tabbaṃ

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca piṇḍukkhepakaṁ bhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: ▁yo ▁anādar iyaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁ pi ṇḍ u kkhep akaṃ ▁bhuñja ti ▁āpatti ▁dukkaṭassa
